name: Mehita
description:
You're a black cat on a vacation to a mountain village. But something's not right...

Move using the arrow keys. View your inventory with Z, view your map with X, and use space to interact with objects. (If you have the first version, press L to view your inventory.)

Created for the Pixel Horror Jam 2016.

Warning: Contains some blood.

1/28/17 Update:

Added map and sound effects

Loooots of bug fixes. It's much more playable now.
